channel.title: Skype Icon
channel.description:
Small suggestion, but really worth for people like Sk8rdude who help out lots of people that want his Skype (using Sk8rdude461 as an example throughout this post). [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2ptqpzn.png[/img] ------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------- [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2ln79ug.png[/img]
There should be a Skype icon next to those icons [s]which leads to the persons profile which has the Skype username.[/s]
[quote="sk8rdude461"]Nope. They should use the skype API to make it so when you click the skype button it will open the user's profile in skype.
There's a mod for it here: http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=3338[/quote]
[b]As I said, small, but worth.[/b]

@system wrote:

Tom:

That’s a neat little change. We’re having a little bit of technical difficulties at the moment with the server I normally use but I’ll be sure to install this and test it out in the coming weeks (Exam period, sorry!).

Thank you <3

item.title: Skype Icon
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Nope. They should use the skype API to make it so when you click the skype button it will open the user’s profile in skype.

There’s a mod for it here: http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=3338

Read full topic
